summary: The Infinity Stones are powerful gems in the Marvel movies. There are six stones, each controlling a different aspect of the universe: Space, Mind, Reality, Power, Time, and Soul. They are super-important in the Marvel stories. The stones were first seen in the movie *Thor* (2011) and later in many other films. Thanos, a bad guy, wants all the stones to destroy half of all life. The heroes try to stop him and return the stones to their rightful places. Even though they're destroyed, the stones keep showing up in new stories.
title: Infinity Stones
